testcase.classname: Amazon bedding Iteam selection and check out testing
testcase.name: Validate Amazon Home page
testcase.system-out: Given user opens Browser....................................................passed Then user on Home page......................................................passed Then user click on Manubar-All..............................................passed Then user click on Shop of Department see All...............................passed Then user click on Home and kitchen.........................................passed Then user click on Bedding..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Amazon bedding Iteam selection and check out testing
testcase.name: Validate Bedding Page
testcase.system-out: Then user on bedding Page...................................................passed Then user click on Feacture brands SafeRest and Ultopia Bedding.............passed When title of page change according to brands...............................passed Then user check the rating of the product and click on it...................passed

testcase.classname: Amazon bedding Iteam selection and check out testing
testcase.name: Validate Product Page
testcase.system-out: Then user is on product page and title on a page change according to Product.passed When product name and Image should change accordingly and product title should change according to new product selection.passed Then user select brown product..............................................passed And product titile should change to brown...................................passed Then user click on Add To Cart..............................................passed And new frame should show up for cart.......................................passed Then user click on cart.....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Amazon bedding Iteam selection and check out testing
testcase.name: Validate cart page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Shopping cart page.........................................passed When check if iteam is alredy in cart.......................................passed Then click on process to checkout...........................................passed
